select count(*) from tbl_member where member_id = #{member_id}
select count(*) from tbl_member where member_nickname =#{member_nickname}
select count(*) from tbl_member where member_name = #{member_name}
select count(*) from tbl_member where member_pw = #{member_pw}

mapper.insert: insert into tbl_profile (profile_id, profile_intro) values (#{profile_id}, #{profile_intro, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
insert into tbl_point_buy (point_num, member_id, member_point) values (seq_point_num.nextval, #{member_id}, #{member_point})
mapper.select: select count(*) as listCnt from tbl_point_buy
mapper.update: update tbl_member a set member_point = (select sum(member_point) from tbl_point_buy b where b.member_id = a.member_id )
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_payment (payment_num, project_num, reword_num, payment_point) values (seq_payment_num.nextval, #{project_num}, #{reword_num}, #{payment_point})
